nodes.text: Syd Thardis was a male Human who lived in the Cularin system during the waning years of the Galactic Republic, working for the organization of the Oblee crime lord Nirama. Thardis eventually left Nirama's organization and by the time of the Clone Wars had became a member of the Believers, a Sith cult that was active in the Cularin system. He learned how to use the Force and became a Force Adept.

Thardis was among a team of Believers that were dispatched to the Cularin system asteroid belt by Len Markus, to prevent the Heroes of Cularin from destroying three crystal shards that were funneling power to the Darkstaff, Sith artifact that was possessed by Markus.

The composition of the group of Believers that appear in Recursion varies depending upon the role-playing tier of the player characters, and Thardis only appears if the players are in the middle or upper tiers.
